member.name: CMSG_HASHED_ENCODE_INFO
member.summary: The CMSG_HASHED_ENCODE_INFO structure is used with hashed messages. It is passed to the function if the CryptMsgOpenToEncode function's dwMsgType parameter is CMSG_ENVELOPED.

member.name: CMSG_HASHED_ENCODE_INFO.cbSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of this structure.

summary.para: This member is not used and should be set to NULL.
Windows Server 2003 and Windows XP: Specifies a handle to the cryptographic service provider (CSP) used to do the hash. The hCryptProv private keys are not used.
This member's data type is HCRYPTPROV.

Unless there is a strong reason for passing in a specific cryptographic provider in hCryptProv, pass zero to use the default RSA or DSS provider to be acquired before doing hash, signature verification, or recipient encryption operations.

member.name: CMSG_HASHED_ENCODE_INFO.HashAlgorithm
member.summary: A structure that contains the hash algorithm type and any associated additional parameters.

member.name: CMSG_HASHED_ENCODE_INFO.pvHashAuxInfo
member.summary: This member is currently not used and must be set to NULL.
